meanings.definition: The action or process of individuating.
meanings.sent1: Her individuations helped her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The individuations of each snowflake make them unique.
meanings.sent3: The individuations of the puppies made it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent4: The individuations of the stars in the sky seemed endless.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the individuations of the flowers in exquisite detail.

meanings.sent1: The individuations of the students showed their diverse personalities.
meanings.sent2: His individuations made him feel like he belonged.
meanings.sent3: The individuations of the fruits in the basket made them look like a colorful family.
meanings.sent4: The individuations of the leaves on the tree symbolized growth and change.
meanings.sent5: The individuations of the clouds created a beautiful pattern in the sky.
